name: Lefty & Righty (Mr. Dazzy)
description:
Lefty & Righty is pretty simple game. It base on the theme Take Care.

The concept is also fairly simple all you need to do is eat the same amount of food your partner eats e.g: left partner & right partner a.k.a lefty & righty

The indicator of how much food lefty & righty eat is shown on the top-left of the screen near pause button, so make sure to balance both of the food with the help of that counter.

Once you balance both sides of that indicator/counter you complete the 1st wave then 2 wave and so on...

There is also a timer on the top-middle of the screen if the timer hits zero then its a GAMEOVER!

Controls

W and A or Left Arrow and Right Arrow to control the see-saw

Hope you enjoy the game and pls provide the feedback too. It will help me improve the game :)
